description: Default OBD-II adapter configuration for ELM327
notes: COM3 is default for Windows. Use /dev/ttyUSB0 or /dev/rfcomm0 for Linux.
retries: Number of retry attempts for failed commands
reconnectDelay: Initial delay before reconnection attempt in milliseconds
reconnectAttempts: Maximum number of reconnection attempts
pidPollRate: Minimum interval between PID reads in milliseconds
supportedPids: List of PIDs to poll during diagnostics
